hero.title: Meet Monica Leggett
hero.subtitle: Professional Certified Coach | Author | Speaker
hero.tagline: Dream It. Plan It. Do It. Live It!

intro.content:
For over 15 years, I've been helping individuals, couples, teams, and small business owners shift from struggling to thriving – one strategic step at a time. As a certified Professional Coach (PCC), mentor coach, and author, I'm passionate about helping you break free from doubt, overwhelm, and frustration to find clarity, confidence, and joy.

Known as the "conversation whisperer," I specialize in helping my clients navigate crucial conversations that build or mend relationships. Whether you're an emerging leader, a small business owner, or someone seeking personal transformation, I provide the strategic guidance and support you need to achieve your goals.

sections.title: Rooted in Connection
sections.content: As one of 10 children, I learned early the power of connection, communication, and finding my unique voice

sections.title: 37 Years of Partnership
sections.content: Married to Steve for 37 years, raised three children, now a grandmother

sections.title: Finding My Purpose
sections.content: Founded New Steps Life Coaching in 2007

sections.title: Author & Thought Leader
sections.content: Wrote books "Doubtful to Decisive" and "Break Free from the S.T.O.P. Syndrome"

credentials.title: Credentials & Certifications
items: PCC Certified (Professional Certified Coach through International Coaching Federation)

philosophy.quote: I believe everyone has the answers within them – sometimes you just need a skilled partner to help you uncover them.

office_hours.title: Office Hours
schedule: Evening appointments available for working professionals

form.title: Send Me a Message

fields.name: referral
fields.label: How Did You Hear About Me?

form.newsletter_opt_in: Yes, I'd like to receive Monica's monthly newsletter with tips, resources, and inspiration for personal growth

questions.question: How quickly will you respond to my message?
questions.answer: I typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.

questions.question: Do you offer virtual coaching sessions?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer both virtual and in-person coaching sessions to accommodate your preferences and schedule.

questions.question: What's the best way to schedule a consultation?
questions.answer: The easiest way is to use the scheduling calendar above or send me a message through the contact form.

questions.question: Do you work with international clients?
questions.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide via Zoom and other video platforms.
